titleDescriptionStatusScenesWereNotProvi: title, description, status or scenes were not provided
titleDescriptionShouldBeString: title, description, type should be of type string
onlyOneActWithType: There may be only 1 Act with type: {{type}}
actWithThisTitleAlreadyExists: Act with that title already exists
couldNotFindActWithThisId: Could not find any Act with that id
pageSizeAndCurrentPageShouldBeStringNumb: pageSize and currentPage should be of type string but the value should be still a number-like. Example: '1' or '5'
invalidSortDirection: Invalid sortDirection query. Allowed directions: 'asc' or 'desc'
